body.section: Hierarchy CapitationArrangement is a kind of FinancialArrangement

section.title: Description
section.p: "A method of paying for medical services on a per-person rather than a per-procedure basis. Under capitation, an HMO pays a doctor a fixed amount each month to take care of HMO members, regardless of how much or how little care each member needs." -eHealthInsurance.org
